brief_description: Gadget Heaven is a one-stop e-commerce platform offering a wide range of tech products and accessories. From computers, laptops, smartphones, and smartwatches to headphones, chargers, and other essential accessories, we provide high-quality gadgets at competitive prices.
challenges_faced: A few challenges faced while developing this project like add to card, product showing according to category etc.
potential_improvements: Adding user authentication, payment process, implementing admin route.

brief_description: Tutor Booking Website is an online platform where users can find tutors for various languages and subjects. You can add your favorite tutors to your list and, if needed, remove them. The site offers an easy way to browse and book tutors based on your preferences.
challenges_faced: Integrating searching functionality and fatching data using specific email.
potential_improvements: Implementing user review system and payment process

brief_description: Sports Equipments offers top-quality cricket, football, volleyball, and more. Shop easily with secure payments and fast delivery. Get the best sports gear and elevate your game today!
challenges_faced: When I secure admin using jwt token faced a challenge. But I have been finally successfull
potential_improvements: Adding new Payment process like Bikash, Nagad etc.

brief_description: This app helps you stay organized by allowing you to add, edit, delete, and categorize tasks easily. Whether you're managing work, personal goals, or daily to-dos, you can keep everything in one place and update tasks as needed. Stay productive and in control of your tasks!
challenges_faced: When I was developing the app, I faced a difficult challenge. I couldn't implement the reorder and drag-and-drop system. Finally, after 8 hours of attempts, I successfully completed it.
potential_improvements: Adding new fetures of jwt authentication
